issue.title: Can you check contacts for cable joints too?

content.raw:
There are definitely points when the cable acts like it has super glue.

I have an image, that I'm struggling to upload, that shows the cable orientation after I have moved the arm as far to the right and up as it will go.  The array started forward and left from where it is.  That cable contact dragged the array up and right, rather than coming free.
content.html:
There are definitely points when the cable acts like it has super glue.

I have an image, that I'm struggling to upload, that shows the cable orientation after I have moved the arm as far to the right and up as it will go. The array started forward and left from where it is. That cable contact dragged the array up and right, rather than coming free.
